publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-742 Ted Brocklebank: UK Referendum on the European Reform Treaty—That the Parliament believes that a UK referendum should be held on the European reform treaty and welcomes the fact that the SNP’s policy is now in line with the long-established policy of the Conservatives. Supported by: Alex Johnstone*, Elizabeth Smith*, Nanette Milne*, Jamie McGrigor*, Murdo Fraser*, John Lamont*

S3M-742 Ted Brocklebank: UK Referendum on the European Reform Treaty—That the Parliament believes that a UK referendum should be held on the European reform treaty and welcomes the fact that the SNP’s policy is now in line with the long-established policy of the Conservatives. Supported by: Mary Scanlon*, Margaret Mitchell*

S3M-742 Ted Brocklebank: UK Referendum on the European Reform Treaty—That the Parliament believes that a UK referendum should be held on the European reform treaty and welcomes the fact that the SNP’s policy is now in line with the long-established policy of the Conservatives. Supported by: Alex Johnstone, Elizabeth Smith, Nanette Milne, Jamie McGrigor, Murdo Fraser, John Lamont, Mary Scanlon, Margaret Mitchell, Bill Aitken*
